dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The sheer chaos of 2020, and yet, Wall Street had one of its best years ever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The sheer chaos of twenty twenty, and yet, Wall Street had one of its best years ever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joe Biden There was unbelievable uncertainty throughout most of the year, but amid it all, everyone on Wall Streetfrom billionaire investors to hidebound millennial day traders in their pajamasgot rich.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? I mean, the market dropped like a stone early on, but then it rebounded almost 50% in just a few months. That's one of the fastest comebacks we've ever seen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? I mean, the market dropped like a stone early on, but then it rebounded almost fifty percent in just a few months. That's one of the fastest comebacks we've ever seen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Financial markets dropped like a stone early in the Covid-19 crisis and then recovered nearly 50% in a span of months, one of the fastest rebounds ever seen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And a huge part of that was driven by these millions of new day traders, you know, stuck at home with their Robinhood apps. They were buying the dip before a lot of the pros even got there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And a huge part of that was driven by these millions of new day traders, you know, stuck at home with their Robinhood apps. They were buying the dip before a lot of the pros even got there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Millions of young quarantining day traders were behind the markets rise, often beating the professionals to buy the dip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and then you've got this whole SPAC phenomenon taking off. Like, over 260 of them went public this year, raising something like $85 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and then you've got this whole S P A C phenomenon taking off. Like, over two hundred sixty of them went public this year, raising something like eighty five dollars billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some 250 SPACs are likely to go public this year, raising over $80 billion in money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild— electric vehicle companies, online gambling stocks… all getting bid up to insane levels by retail investors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild- electric vehicle companies, online gambling stocks... all getting bid up to insane levels by retail investors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A market for speculative IPOs, called SPACs, took shape so bankers could list electric vehicle companies, marijuana growers and online gambling stocks, which Robinhood traders would promptly bid to the stratosphere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's Tesla, which added about half a trillion dollars in market value. Just mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Tesla, which added about half a trillion dollars in market value. Just mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tesla gained about half a trillion dollars in value.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it wasn't just the newcomers. Big players like Blackstone had an amazing year too— their stock was up 19%, outperforming most of Wall Street.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it wasn't just the newcomers. Big players like Blackstone had an amazing year too- their stock was up nineteen percent, outperforming most of Wall Street.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Blackstones stock is up 19% this year, outperforming most on Wall Street.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. And then you've got Baillie Gifford's Scottish Mortgage Trust, which returned 410% over five years. They've got huge positions in Tesla, Amazon, even private companies like SpaceX.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. And then you've got Baillie Gifford's Scottish Mortgage Trust, which returned four hundred ten percent over five years. They've got huge positions in Tesla, Amazon, even private companies like SpaceX.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its investments in Tesla, Amazon, Tencent and a few dozen high-growth stocks have propelled it to a 400% gain over the past five years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Cathie Wood at Ark Invest— her flagship ETF is up 150% this year alone. She's just been on fire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Cathie Wood at Ark Invest- her flagship E T F is up one hundred fifty percent this year alone. She's just been on fire.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Her flagship Ark Innovation ETF is up 150% year-to-date, and assets have surged to $15 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, right? Like, all this speculation… it feels a bit like the dot-com bubble again.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, right? Like, all this speculation... it feels a bit like the dot-com bubble again.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Once markets recovered, initial public offerings began to hum like nothing seen since the Dot-Com-bubble era.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. But hey, the billionaires got $1.9 trillion richer this year, so somebody's winning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. But hey, the billionaires got one point nine dollars trillion richer this year, so somebody's winning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Worlds Billionaires Have Gotten $1.9 Trillion Richer In 2020

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. And with interest rates so low and the economy reopening, some folks are even talking about a prolonged Biden bull market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And with interest rates so low and the economy reopening, some folks are even talking about a prolonged Biden bull market.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The stars are lining up for a prolonged bull market as rock-bottom interest rates, strong household balance sheets and the eventual reopening of America give tailwinds to the economy and financial markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: We'll see if that plays out. For now, it's been one heck of a ride.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We'll see if that plays out. For now, it's been one heck of a ride.
